name: dibbeelyn.github.io
tagline: Welcome to my page. Welcome to my world. :)
body:
### Purpose:
My first try in creating an online journal. I hope this is something my future self will be thankful about why I'm doing this today. I also hope to improve my English writing skills through this page. Any corrections, please send them my way. :)

### Mission:
To inspire others to do the same thing. My friends specially! :D

### Social:
I have purposely deactivated my Facebook account. I will perhaps write an article why I did that. I hope this page will serve as a way for me to socialize a bit more! :)

If you wish to connect with me, I am on Instragram and Twitter as @dibbeelyn. Feel free to connect!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
